description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nForbearance Forgone:
Your {CLASS_Sorcery} creatures and {RACE_Beacon} creatures always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_PROTECT}. After an enemy {CLASS_Sorcery} creature {ACTION_casts} a spell, that Spell Gem is Sealed and this creature's Spell Gems gain 1 {STAT_charge}.
name: Stoic's Lantern
